plot: Seeking escape, Darren takes a summer job at a mountain resort. When opportunity comes knocking from back home, Darren must make a decision about the life he wanted and the life his path now follows.
title: Vertigo Summer
plot_es: Seeking escape, Darren takes a summer job at a mountain resort. When opportunity comes knocking from back home, Darren must make a decision about the life he wanted and the life his path now follows.
plot_en: Seeking escape, Darren takes a summer job at a mountain resort. When opportunity comes knocking from back home, Darren must make a decision about the life he wanted and the life his path now follows.
